sentences.en: " I was only made to assuage my parents'reproductive vanity,'she says bitterly.
sentences.cn: “ 我来到这个世上只是为了满足我父母的生育虚荣心. ” 她忿忿地说.

sentences.en: Conidia are the characteristic asexual reproductive units of fungi.
sentences.cn: 分生孢子是真菌的特征,无性繁殖的单位.
每种动物都有生殖器官.

sentences.en: Genetic effects include inheritable changes resulting from mutations in reproductive cells.
sentences.cn: 遗传的影响包括再生细胞变异引起的遗传变化.

sentences.en: Lactation is the final phase of the reproductive cycle of mammals.
sentences.cn: 泌乳是哺乳动物繁殖周期的最后阶段.

sentences.en: My botanical interest is largely confined to the reproductive processes in vascular plants.
sentences.cn: 我对植物学的兴趣主要限于维管植物的生殖过程.

sentences.en: Not all doctors truly understand the reproductive cycle.
sentences.cn: 并非所有的医生都真正了解生殖周期。

sentences.en: Other birds feed on developing reproductive structures or seed.
sentences.cn: 另外一些鸟取食发育中的繁殖器官或种子.

sentences.en: Recent advances in reproductive endocrinology are primarily due to the development of radioimmunoassay.
sentences.cn: 最近取得的生殖内分秘研究成果,主要是由于放射免疫分析的进展.

sentences.en: Some bacteria produce special reproductive cells called spores.
sentences.cn: 某些细菌能产生特殊的生殖细胞叫孢子.

sentences.en: The endometrium and its fluids play a major role in the reproductive process.
sentences.cn: 子宫内膜及其液体在生殖过程中起着重要作用.

sentences.en: The male reproductive organs are exterior to the body.
sentences.cn: 男性生殖器在身体的外部.

sentences.en: The occurrence of apomictic reproductive structures on the leaf of the bog orchid, is of interest.
sentences.cn: 有趣的是在叶状沼兰叶子上发生无融合生殖的结构.

sentences.en: The subject of demography has merged with that of reproductive strategies of organisms.
sentences.cn: 关于生命统计这个课题已渗入了关于有机体繁殖对策的课题.

sentences.en: This difference is often accompanied with the partial or complete abortion of the reproductive organs.
sentences.cn: 这种差异往往伴随着生殖器官一部分或全部的退化.

words.tran_cn: 可再生的；可繁殖的；可复写的
扬声器；复制程序；再生器
复制；再生；生殖；使…在脑海中重现

phrases.tran_cn: 生殖周期；生殖循环；再生循环

trans.tran_cn: 生殖的，再生产的，复制的
trans.tran_en: relating to the process of producing babies, young animals, or plants
